menu.welcome_text:
‚ò† Welcome!  
The Duck Team Bot 🦆 is excited to help you organize an engaging giveaway 🎉 on your channel. We strive to make your interaction with your subscribers more fun and interactive! 

🌟 Our goal is not just to entertain but also to reward your followers for their activity. Make sure you have all the necessary details for the contest: prizes 🎁, participation requirements 📋, and the duration ‚è∞. 

🤩 Let‚Äôs create something memorable and interesting together! Are you ready to start setting up a new giveaway? 🏆

draw.chanel_id: Please enter the username of the channel where the giveaway will be published in the format @username. 🎉 You must be an administrator of this channel and add the bot as an administrator. 🤖 If the channel is private, you need to send the ID of that channel. 🔐 To find out the ID of a private channel, forward any post from that channel to the special bot @getmyid_bot. 📩 The bottom line will be the response from the bot and will serve as the ID of your private channel. 📜 Forward this ID to the bot! 🚀
draw.chanel_id_check:
Enter the username of the channel for verification in @username format.
 
 If the channel is private, then you need to send the id of this channel to find out the id of the private channel, forward any post from this channel to the special bot @getmyid_bot, the bottom line is the response from the bot and will be the id of your private channel.  Forward this id to the bot.
 Indicate the link to this channel in the description so that the participants of the giveaway know which channels you need to subscribe
draw.not_admin: For publish the giveaway, you must be the administrator of this channel.  Send username as administrator
draw.not_in_chanel: The bot is not the administrator of this channel.  Add bot to admins and submit @username again
draw.draw_text: Enter a description of the giveaway. Tip: describe what the prizes will be, how many winners there will be and what each of them will win, which channels the participants need to subscribe to, and indicate the date and time of the end of the giveaway. You can use the html markup. 1)Bold text - your text 2)Italic text - your text 3)Hyperlink to channel - your text. Link must be in this format: https://t.me/channel
draw.file: Send a picture or GIF (optional, if not needed, send any other message)
draw.n_posts: Enter the number of recent posts to check the reactions.
draw.post_time: Enter the date and time of the start of the giveaway in the format: (year-month-day hours: minutes), for example 2020-10-25 21:05
draw.end_time: Enter the date and time of the end of the giveaway in the format: (year-month-day hours: minutes), for example 2020-10-31 21:55
draw.over_time: This time has already expired, enter the time that will be greater than the current moment
draw.invalid_format_time: Invalid time format, enter the time in the format: (year-month-day hours: minutes), for example 2020-08-25 21:00
draw.post_biger: Posting time is longer, enter the time in the format: (year-month-day hours: minutes), for example 2020-08-26 21:41
draw.change_text: What do you need to change in the giveaway?
draw.posts_text: The number of posts for checking reactions:
draw.submit_text: The giveaway has been created and will be published on the channel at the selected time
draw.n_posts_error: You have not fulfilled the conditions for the number of reactions to posts, carefully read the terms of the draw.
draw.not_subscribe: @Ducks: You haven't subscribed to all channels, please read the giveaway discription carefully and subscribe to all necessary channels to participate
draw.failed_post: Failed to send the giveaway because the channel was deleted

my_draw.posts_text: The number of posts for checking reactions:
